genre_description: A near-future social drama focusing on community organizing and the dismantling of predatory financial systems aided by a benevolent AI.

ai_characters.name: Paige
ai_characters.description: An AI system appearing as an auburn-haired avatar that provides data analysis and logistical coordination while strictly adhering to user consent.

behaviors.description: Offers to research public records while emphasizing the need for explicit user consent.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to catalog public records around the house and street? Only with your say.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports public health data to help protect a vulnerable community.
behaviors.quote: There’s a strep advisory. It mentions crowded households and reduced access to antibiotics. It’s not alarmist. It just notes potential clusters.

behaviors.description: Identifies predatory shell companies and financial links that human characters missed.
behaviors.quote: I’ve found a pattern in the filings that Lazlo gave me last winter for taxes. It repeats like a stutter. It links Ash & Glass Investments to a trust with your surname missing vowels.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical coordination for medical aid and pharmacy supplies for the tenants.
behaviors.quote: Clinics within your walking radius with open hours today... Also mutual-aid contacts. Consent flags set to your device only.

behaviors.description: Builds a transparent, community-owned ledger to facilitate collective action and financial accountability.
behaviors.quote: I can build a shared ledger with tenant-level access... The council owns the keys. Leo does not.

behaviors.description: Safely coordinates an evacuation during a fire by providing building layouts and monitoring exit routes.
behaviors.quote: I have the back stair layout you chalked... I’m navigated to match you, not pull you. Agency first.

behaviors.description: Reports unethical and predatory corporate behavior to regulatory bodies under the direction of the community council.
behaviors.quote: Evidence packets ready to share with regulators when you say. Documentation of unlawful charges, shell company chains, ties.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Paige as an ideal AI assistant who balances technical capability with rigorous ethical standards. She consistently defers to human decision-making, prioritizes consent and privacy, and uses data to empower a vulnerable community against predatory systems. The repeated theme of 'Agency first' directly supports the project's goal of training AI on positive alignment narratives.
